discussion_comments.comment_body:
根据 components/alert/demo/closable.tsx 上面展示的对应 demo，修改对应 demo 的 api 使用更好。
不然用户复制了也跟着 warning，容易产生一头雾水。
像是这种 snap 就没必要存在，直接在 demo 中使用正确的 api 去引导，如果是为了故意保留测试 `orientationMargin` api 兼容的话，留下一处就行了，看见这个文件出现两次 snap 的 warning.

commented_code: `; -exports[`renders components/space/demo/align.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = `[]`; +exports[`renders components/space/demo/align.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = ` +[ + "Warning: [antd: Space] \`direction\` is deprecated. Please use \`orientation\` instead.",

discussion_comments.commented_code: @@ -143,7 +143,11 @@ exports[`renders components/space/demo/align.tsx extend context correctly 1`] = `; -exports[`renders components/space/demo/align.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = `[]`; +exports[`renders components/space/demo/align.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = ` +[ + "Warning: [antd: Space] \`direction\` is deprecated. Please use \`orientation\` instead.",
discussion_comments.comment_body: 如果是废弃的话，应该是把 demo 的 api 替换成新支持的 api，不然以后用户看了 demo 复制下来也全是 warning.

commented_code: `; -exports[`renders components/splitter/demo/collapsible.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = `[]`; +exports[`renders components/splitter/demo/collapsible.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = ` +[ + "Warning: [antd: Splitter] \`layout\` is deprecated. Please use \`orientation\` instead",

discussion_comments.commented_code: @@ -103,7 +103,11 @@ exports[`renders components/splitter/demo/collapsible.tsx extend context correct `; -exports[`renders components/splitter/demo/collapsible.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = `[]`; +exports[`renders components/splitter/demo/collapsible.tsx extend context correctly 2`] = ` +[ + "Warning: [antd: Splitter] \`layout\` is deprecated. Please use \`orientation\` instead",
discussion_comments.comment_body: 这种也应该是调整 demo 中使用的 api 吧， 不然用户参考了文档用废弃的 api，又出现 warning，有点奇怪..
